website_summaries.verdict: The fine-tip markers are a quality choice for the creative wine drinker looking to do more than write their name.
pros: Markers are available in a pack of 4 or 7
Ink dries quickly and is smudge-resistant
Glasses can be cleaned effortlessly with a damp cloth, even if they have sat and dried for a few days
The fine tip allows for neat lettering and detailed designs
cons: Red marker is more of a light-pink color so may not stand out on a glass of rosé

customer_reviews.title: Great for a party, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect final touch to any party! When throwing an engagement party, I bought these so that our guests wouldn't spend the time wondering which glass belonged to whom. Whether it be wine glasses, beer glasses, or just water, this is a great final touch to any party. I recommend waiting a few minutes before picking up the glass where you wrote on it just to let it dry, but overall, the writing came off the in the dishwasher which was an added bonus. I read a few reviews that said you'd have to take it off manually, but the dishwasher did just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.text: These were excellent. We used them for Thanksgiving and everyone loved drawing on their wine glasses. The marker doesn't come off while using the glass, but once under water it comes off very easily. If you wash it off quickly, the water alone will take it off. If you wait hours or until the next day, you may have to give it a gentle rub for it to come off. Definitely no scrubbing needed though. Highly recommend these markers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Utke

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to write on mason jars and they're great! The colors are as expected and the ink stays on. If you touch them while your hands are wet or scrub at them with a wet towel, the ink comes off. But, other than that, it stays on pretty well! I write with them on mirrors and put names on wine glasses at parties. Everyone loves them. The only thing that you have to watch for is that some colors work better on some things than others (i.e. Gold won't show up if you write on a jar full of white rice or a glass of white wine, it it's great on a jar of black beans or red wine).

product_meta.title: Vino Marker Metallic Wine Glass Washable Pens (4 pack) - Perfect Housewarming Present or Hostess Gift for Wine Tastings, Dinner Parties, or Any Event
feature_bullets: WINE TIME: Each pack of pens includes 4 markers, one silver, one red, and two gold pens.

EASY TO USE: For red wine, write anywhere on the glass. Just let it dry for 3 to 5 minutes and it will stay on for the life of the party. The ink will not smear even while holding your wine glass. For white wine and cold drinks write on the base of the wine glass for best results. The ink washes off easily with warm soapy water.

PERFECT PRESENT: Wine marker pens make a great hostess gift and housewarming present, and are a great party favor or unique gift idea for wine lovers. The ink is non-toxic and food grade allowing you to customize a multitude of surfaces.

PARTY IDEAS: Vino Markers work on any glass or glazed ceramic surface. Perfect for wine tastings, to replace wine tags, to label a present, on canning jars, to add names to place settings, to replace wine charms....the possibilities are endless.
